Encounter.Dialogue: Hello, Mochi! You don't have to call me operator
Hello, Mochi! You don't have to call me operator
Hello, Mochi! You don't have to call me operator
“Woah… this place is huge. Let’s start searching here. My great-granddad’s schematics could be anywhere. Hey, MOCHI! Come in!”
“Ok! Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator is ready to help!”
“Ok! MOCHI is ready to help, Operator.”
“And, my name is Ritsu. Just call me Ritsu.”
“Ok! Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator is ready to help, Operator!”
“I guess we’ll work on that later…”
“My dad said that my great-grandad used to work here. I wonder what that was like.”
“Ok! Self diagnostic complete, all systems green.”
““Turn on your Wifi, MOCHI. Connect to this terminal and download updates.””
““Maybe my name is too much for you. The guys at robotics school call me Ritz. How about you call me Ritz?””
“Ok! Updating Operator designation... I like that name!”
““Oh, that was easier than I thought.””
“I guess nature kind of took over this place.”
“Dad said this place was built in 2020s. But this tech is right out of 2070. What was great-grandad working on?”
“Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator knows your dad. He’s really nice!”
“Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator agrees, this place seems really old.”
“Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator agrees, this place seems really old.”
“Here’s another terminal. Connect to this and download updates, MOCHI.”

“I don’t know if you remember this, but I built you using one of my great-grandad’s schematics. You’re more advanced than any robot I’ve seen at robotics school. And my great-grand wrote your schematics like… a bajillion years ago.”
“Mobile OP Compact Hologram Initiator agrees, this place seems really old.”
““Here’s another terminal. Connect to this and download updates, MOCHI.””

“I don’t know if you remember this, but I built you using one of my great-grandad’s schematics. You’re more advanced than any robot I’ve seen at robotics school. And my great-grand wrote your schematics like… a bajillion years ago.”
“Come on… you can’t leave me alone here. Please come back.”
“Did MOCHI miss something? Where are we?”
“We’re deeper in the factory. Everything’s ok now. Don’t worry about it.”
“The latest stable update includes optional designations for my Operator. Operator is now designated as Ritsu and Ritz.”
“That’s an optional feature? How did it get activated?”
“MOCHI tried extra hard to remember your designation request!”
“You tried... extra hard? Is that a feature too?”
“This place was really lonely without you, MOCHI.”
“MOCHI is glad to be back, Ritz!”
